text: Gaetano Victor "Guy" Molinari (November 23, 1928 - July 25, 2018) was an American politician. He was a former United States Representative who served in Congress from 1981 through 1989. He also served as borough president of Staten Island, New York from 1990 through 2001. Molinari died of pneumonia on July 25, 2018 in Manhattan, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in New York City Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:People from Manhattan Category:Staten Island borough presidents Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Guy Molinari
